title: TVS Motor sales rise four per cent to 3.06 lakh units in April
description: Sales of electric scooter TVS iQube Electric were at 6,227 units in April 2023 as against sales of 1,420 units in the same month last year, it said, adding the production was constrained last month due to new battery safety norm AIS156 changeover and supply chain challenges.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
